name: Slave's Sword
description: Slave's Sword is the story of Luna, a former aristocratic knight of the Empire. Now living peacefully as a mercenary, she quickly becomes involved in a scandal that results in her enslavement. Can Luna recapture her freedom and escape from her predicament?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.  Lag may occur from loading menus or maps.  Turn off other programs before running the game.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2+ GHz Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50) DirectX: Version 9.0 Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display.  Lag may occur from loading menus or maps.  Turn off other programs before running the game.
